summary:
Welcome to QuantoSwap: DEX with LST & LRT staking - Trade, refer and earn daily on QuantoSwap DEX!

 Yield Tokenization - On QuantoSwap, you can earn Standardized Yield — yield from depositing funds into a yield source — as well as income from Principal Tokens and Yield Tokens.

 Referral Program - Boost your passive income by inviting friends to join QuantoSwap as liquidity providers or traders. Our referral program rewards you with a 10% bonus on two types of transactions: staking and farming.
